languages.text: When shooting in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} of all shots after the first is reduced by the recoil parameter of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: When shooting in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}burst{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}hit chance{/g} of all shots after the first is reduced by the {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recoil{/g} parameter of the weapon.

When shooting in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} of all shots after the first is reduced by the recoil parameter of the weapon.

languages.text: Beim Abfeuern einer {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}Salve{/g} wird die {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trefferchance{/g} aller Schüsse nach dem ersten um den Rückstoßparameter der Waffe reduziert.
languages.original_text: When shooting in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} of all shots after the first is reduced by the recoil parameter of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: Beim Abfeuern einer {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}Salve{/g} wird die {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} aller Schüsse nach dem ersten um den {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}Rückstoßparameter{/g} der Waffe reduziert.

languages.text: Lors d'un tir en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}rafale{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} de tous les tirs qui suivent le premier sont réduites par le paramètre recul de l'arme.
languages.original_text: When shooting in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} of all shots after the first is reduced by the recoil parameter of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: Lors d'un tir en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}rafale{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} de tous les tirs qui suivent le premier sont réduites par le paramètre {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}recul{/g} de l'arme.

languages.text: 进行{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}连发{/g}射击时，首发射击之后的所有射击{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}都会下降，下降程度取决于武器的后坐力。
languages.original_text: When shooting in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} of all shots after the first is reduced by the recoil parameter of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: 进行{g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}连发{/g}射击时，首发射击之后的所有射击{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}都会下降，下降程度取决于武器的{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}后坐力{/g}。

languages.original_text: When shooting in a burst, the hit chance of all shots after the first is reduced by the recoil parameter of the weapon.

languages.text: Al disparar en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}ráfaga{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}probabilidad de impacto{/g} de todos los disparos después del primero se reduce en el parámetro de retroceso del arma.
languages.original_text: When shooting in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} of all shots after the first is reduced by the recoil parameter of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: Al disparar en {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}ráfaga{/g}, la {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}probabilidad de impacto{/g} de todos los disparos después del primero se reduce en el parámetro de {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}retroceso{/g} del arma.

languages.text: При стрельбе {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}очередью{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}шанс попадания{/g} второго и последующих выстрелов уменьшается на значение отдачи оружия.
languages.original_text: When shooting in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} of all shots after the first is reduced by the recoil parameter of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: При стрельбе {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередью{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шанс попадания{/g} второго и последующих выстрелов уменьшается на значение {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}отдачи{/g} оружия.
При стрельбе {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}очередью{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}шанс попадания{/g} второго и последующих выстрелов уменьшается на значение {g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}отдачи{/g} оружия.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}連射{/g}の場合、一発目以降の{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中率{/g}は武器の反動パラメータによって減少する。
languages.original_text: When shooting in a {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacksGlossary}burst{/g}, the {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit chance{/g} of all shots after the first is reduced by the recoil parameter of the weapon.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:BurstAttacks}連射{/g}の場合、一発目以降の{g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}命中率{/g}は武器の{g|Encyclopedia:Recoil}反動{/g}パラメータによって減少する。
